name: Enlighten (oliverdemaster)
description:
You can burn things. Do I have to say more ?

Enlighten is a little  3D jump & run game, 

in which you can  burn  objects in the environment. 

Hop hop your way over the ice canyons and don't die like I did.

 Can you do better than me ?

Story: 

You are a little fire-elemental named Flambi. 

Suddenly you awake in the middle of nowhere in this icy and

 snowy world, now you have to find a way back to your village!

The way isn't easy, but it's your job to discover and survive this harsh environment
